attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the debacle that is the Pre Budget Report I believe that Labour is no longer interested in working families and just wants to penalise us by making us poorer. The tax cuts given will not benefit my family nor any of those that I know.IF you want to make a difference then you need to give us the money because without it we cannot choose to spend it.

rejection.details:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/GoToCountryNow/
Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
